name: Alex MD21 26" 32H Disc Rear Wheel - Unisex
description: Value-priced and ideal for all-mountain and cross-country mountain biking, this rear wheel uses sturdy double-wall aluminum rims, 32 DT stainless steel spokes and a Shimano M475 hub with Shimano HG freehub body. It can be set-up tubeless for better puncture protection and optimal tire pressure. Comes with a 100 mm quick release.Aluminum double wall 26-inch rims.Designed with tubeless conversion in mind.32 DT stainless steel spokes.Hard-wearing Shimano M475 hub with Shimano HG freehub body.Compatible with 6-bolt disc rotors.135 mm quick release.Inner rim width: 21mm.Outer rim width: 26mm.Rim height: 18mm.Presta valve.Rim weight: 450g.
